value.stringValue: A Case for {!myVariable_current.Account.Name} not worked for 3 days.

value.stringValue: Case for {!myVariable_current.Account.Name} still open after 5 days.
A Case for {!myVariable_current.Account.Name} has now been open for 5 working days. Please review at your earliest convenience.
Case for {!myVariable_current.Account.Name} still open after 5 days.

rules.name: myRule_12
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Send 3 day not updated Notification

rules.name: myRule_20
rules.label: Timely update for 3 days if Wed,Thu,Fri
